#summary Lists the history of changes to the Wesabe budgeting workbook.

=Version 1.2 (May 1, 2008)=

  * Fixed a bug that occured when a week or month had no data. Range names were not being generated after a missing week or month.

=Version 1.1 (April 26, 2008)=

  * Fixed the Monthly Spending and Weekly Spending worksheets to handle the scenario where there is no tag splits column in the Transactions worksheet. ([http://code.google.com/p/wesabe-excel-budget/issues/detail?id=3 Issue 3])

=Version 1.0 (February 3, 2008)=

  * Original version
